Name: Bring Back The Sun by Daniel da Silva
About the game: Bring Back The Sun Bring Back The Sun is a simple but challenging 2D Platformer. The focus is on jumping right and only that. No enemies, no spikes, no wall jumps, no double jumps. Just simple jumps to get through the levels. Features A pure experience Challenging but not hardcore Jump through over 40 levels Minimalistic graphics Full Controller Support Atmospheric soundtrack You can expect 1-3 hours playtime for your first run depending on your skill level.
